medical_history.chief_complaint: severe RUQ and epigastric abdominal pain
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Acute onset of severe RUQ and epigastric pain started last night about 1 hour after eating pizza. Symptoms are severe but she denies emesis, fevers, or diarrhea.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Remote history of pancreatitis ~ years ago for which she was hospitalized; she has been asymptomatic since then. Recent C-section 3 months ago.
medical_history.family_history: + for gall stones on her mother's side of the family; father and mother are alive and healthy; her 2 children are healthy.
medical_history.social_history: Denies alcohol use and only takes pre-natal vitamins; currently breast feeding.
